applicant-name.name: TIANJIN JUNKAI AGRICULTURAL TECH CO LTD
天津均凯农业科技有限公司

invention-title: 一种3-氯-2-氨甲基-5-三氟甲基吡啶盐酸盐的制备方法

abstract.p: The invention provides a preparation method of 3-chloro-2-aminomethyl-5-trifluoromethylpyridine hydrochloride, which comprises the following steps: S1, reacting benzylidene glycine methyl ester with sodium hydride to pull out hydrogen in an organic solvent A under protective gas, and then reacting with 3-chloro-2-fluoro-5-trifluoromethylpyridine to obtain a compound I; s2, dissolving the compound I in an organic solvent B, adding into diluted hydrochloric acid, reacting at a certain temperature to remove benzylidene protection, separating liquid after the reaction is completed, and performing water phase reflux decarboxylation to obtain a compound II. According to the invention, benzylidene glycine methyl ester is firstly subjected to hydrogen extraction to form carbon anions, and then the carbon anions and 3-chloro-2-fluoro-5-trifluoromethylpyridine are subjected to substitution reaction to construct a main carbon skeleton of the product, so that the reaction selectivity is higher, the reaction yield is high, and the reaction conditions are mild, therefore, the preparation method disclosed by the invention is novel, good in selectivity and suitable for industrial production. The total preparation cost is low, and the yield is high.

本发明提供了一种3‑氯‑2‑氨甲基‑5‑三氟甲基吡啶盐酸盐的制备方法，包括如下步骤：S1：在保护气下，在有机溶剂A中，亚苄基甘氨酸甲酯与氢化钠反应拔氢，再与3‑氯‑2‑氟‑5‑三氟甲基吡啶反应得到化合物I；S2：将化合物Ⅰ溶于有机溶剂B中，加入到稀盐酸中，在一定温度下反应脱亚苄基保护，反应完分液，水相回流脱羧得到化合物II。本发明采用亚苄基甘氨酸甲酯先拔氢形成碳负离子，再与3‑氯‑2‑氟‑5‑三氟甲基吡啶发生取代反应从而构建产物的主要碳骨架，反应选择性更高，反应收率高，反应条件温和，因此，本发明所述的制备方法新颖，选择性好，总体制备成本低、收率高。
